meanings.definition: A person who forms or pursues ideals.
meanings.sent1: She is known as one of the idealizers in our community, always striving for a better world.
meanings.sent2: The idealizers in the group worked together to create a vision for the future.
meanings.sent3: The idealizers at the meeting had big dreams and even bigger smiles.
meanings.sent4: Her role as an idealizer was like a beacon of hope in a sea of uncertainty.
meanings.sent5: The idealizers' passion for change was contagious and inspiring to all.

meanings.definition: A group or organization that promotes or advocates for ideals.
meanings.sent1: The idealizers behind the campaign worked tirelessly to spread their message.
meanings.sent2: As an idealizer, the organization aimed to make a positive impact on society.
meanings.sent3: The idealizers' dedication to their cause was truly admirable.
meanings.sent4: The idealizers stood out like bright stars in a dark sky of indifference.
meanings.sent5: Being part of the idealizers' team felt like being part of a movement for change.
